sentence: The main event space connects to the parking area and something else like a shopping area maybe
There are many restaurants around and it is walking distance to Olympic Park Coca Cola CN and the aquarium
Oversize overflow parking is available across the road in Phips Parking and can even accommodate tour buses tractor trailers
They also offer complimentary valet and validate your parking ticket
From our arrival handled by the efficient Valet Parking staff to the Bellman who helped us to our room after a seamless check in at the Front Desk the entire stay was ideal
Everything was wonderful from the valet parking to check in walking my luggage it and even check out it was great
In town for a quick overnight to see concert at Chastain Park
We purchased a package that included our room valet parking and breakfast
Parking too expensive location great friendly staff
Easily accessible parking deck for short term or monthly use
Parking situation definitely improved on value
I opted for an independent parking garage nearby at a lower price point with no in and out privileges
Paying for parking each time we left it cost 18
Parking in the garage next door is 18 day valet is 44
Although I would highly recommend this hotel parking may be costly for some
The one thing I would say is let guest know to park and the charges associated with parking
The only downside was the “ sticker shock ” on the parking fee of 44 day
I did not like the parking accommodations so far away from the front door due to the main parking area being under construction
I did n’t realize we would be charged to park and then charged again to exit

Old Ritz Carlton property made a tad cool but the filthy outside room windows bathroom horror stains stool on doors along with really weak Front Desk workers 247 poor communication from top Management about problems and even regarding the garage being on 100 lock down for a few hours while Terrible Trump was talking to fundraisers there our 2nd day made it bad
